title: In Cowboys Debut, Greg Hardy Energizes Pass Rush Against Brady, Patriots (Dallas Cowboys)
text: ( Source : Dallas Cowboys ) ARLINGTON, Texas - Back from his four-game NFL suspension, Greg Hardy delivered what the Cowboys signed him in March to do on the field week after week, and especially against four-time Super Bowl champion Tom
